text: 1 weeks ago 5 views Show more Our popular site LVROCKS has not only become a Las Vegas favorite but also a worldwide favorite. Also, in 2013 lvrocks.com had over 3 million viewers and listeners on our site and substations and still going. We also have a continuous playlist spinning music of all genres when we are not live on air. LVROCKS also cater to independent music. We have been thriving in business for over a decade. We continue to run strong with longevity in a growing market.
